DOC.detailed_description: The healthy men age 20-60 year , frequently smoke cigarette consume alcohol , enrol study . Subjects exclude consume 3 servings/day vegetable fruit , one serving/week lycopene-rich food ; take antioxidant , vitamin , mineral supplement ; history chronic disease ; take lipid-lowering antihypertensive medications.The subject randomly assign receive placebo , 6mg , 15mg lycopene capsule per day 8 week . Study substance suspend soybean oil give acid-soluble gelatin capsule . A placebo contain soybean oil ( 100 % ) supply identical-looking capsule . All subject instruct consume one capsule per day right meal choice . All participant encourage maintain usual lifestyle dietary habit .
DOC.criteria: healthy men frequently smoke cigarette consume alcohol consumption 3 servings/day vegetable fruit , one serving/week lycopenerich food take antioxidant , vitamin , mineral supplement history chronic disease ( diabetes , heart disease , renal disease ) take lipidlowering antihypertensive medication
